Content:
So, it’s been a hot minute since we last spoke.
This about sums it up.


Long story very short:
I’m getting a bit better at actually recording/posting content – my various social/forum channels are active, and are all gradually being brought up to date
My new website is up – it’s still a work in progress, but hopefully works better than the last one
My project list has grown a bit – going forward, I’ll consolidate all threads into one big one here
Some are only vaguely moto-related – I’ll link updates here so you can pick your poison
One of my bikes is in the UK awaiting pickup – I’ll be there next week
The itinerary includes the UK, Ireland, the NW200, and the TT
If you’re keen for a ride, a pint, and/or a meal, hit me up
Cheers,
C3M.
